page.title: 17Facilities In Cherry Hinton
page.content: In Cherry Hinton there are various activity centres for both adults and children.For adults there is the Green Hut,which is a corrugated metal hut by the level crossing and the Community Centre,which houses varying group activities both for adults and for children.There is a play_bus for infants,a badminton club,the Co-op Women's Guild and for children there is Boys Brigade, Brownies, Guides, football clubs, Cubs, Scouts, Playgroups, Acorn Nursery, volleyball, photography and break-dancing.There is also a playgroup for children of all ages which is being run in the Summer Holidays. This has nothing to do with the Holiday 85 leaflet. The holiday playgroup might consist of tennis, badminton, swimming and various other action activities.
